articles.title: Oscar-Winning SFX Makeup Legend Greg Cannom Dead at 74 - Fangoria
articles.description: Oscar-winning special effects makeup legend Greg Cannom, responsible for the effects behind films like THE LOST BOYS, has passed away.

articles.title: I broke up with Google search. It was surprisingly easy. - The Washington Post
articles.description: I challenged myself, and readers, to try switching away from the search king. Here’s what I learned.

articles.title: Nintendo adds anti-arbitration clause to its EULA - Polygon
articles.description: Nintendo updated its EULA to make it harder to file a lawsuit or participate in a class action.

articles.title: Jony Ive Can’t Save Us From the iPhone Addiction He Helped Create - Gizmodo
articles.description: Especially not with some kind of pocketable AI.

articles.title: Google I/O 2025: What to expect, including updates to Gemini and Android 16 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google I/O, Google's biggest developer conference of the year, is nearly upon us. Here's what to expect, including updates to Gemini and Android.

articles.title: You Can Now Use LegoGPT to Turn Your Text Inputs Into Lego Designs - CNET
articles.description: This free AI tool will help you create Lego designs that actually work.
